mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS id, a.NAME AS NAME, t.NAME AS userName, a.contact_name AS contactPerson, a.contact_phone AS contactPhone, d.disposal_service AS disposalService, d.fund_provider AS fundProvider, d.pawn_pro as debtorPro, d.pawn_city as debtorCity, d.pawn_area as debtorArea, a.ref_price as refPrice, a.extra AS image, a.reject_reason as rejectReason FROM enrolling_activity a LEFT JOIN enrolling_activity_import_real_data d ON a.id = d.activity_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, NAME, certificate_number AS certificate FROM t_user WHERE delete_flag = '0' UNION ALL SELECT id, NAME, license AS certificate FROM t_company WHERE delete_flag = '0' ) t ON a.party_id = t.id WHERE a.delete_flag = '0' AND d.delete_flag = '0' AND third_party_status = '4'
AND a.status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND d.operator_id = #{operatorId}
AND t.name like concat(concat('%', #{userName}), '%')
AND a.name like concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND a.contact_name like concat(concat('%', #{contactPerson}), '%')
order by a.created_at desc
mapper.update:
update enrolling_activity_import_real_data
begin_at = #{beginAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_at = #{endAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where activity_id in
#{empnoItem}
